p: NO circuit (Carefusion) and Anaconda were connected to ventilator tubing and gas concentrations was measured at different circuit outlets. Ventilator (NPB 840) was set to V-AC, 450 mL and 16 BPM. Two sevoflurane concentrations (5 mL/h and 8 mL/h) and three FiO2 (air, 50 % and 100 % oxygen) were tested against constant NO flow (20 ppm).
